mapper.select: SELECT COUNT( tbl_name ) as totalTblCount, SUM( tbl_size ) as totalTblSize, SUM( tbl_col_num ) as totalTblCol, SUM( all_row_count ) as totalTblRow FROM ( SELECT tbl_name, tbl_size, tbl_col_num, all_row_count FROM view_met_detail_outline WHERE dt = ( SELECT max( dt ) FROM view_met_detail_outline ) GROUP BY tbl_name, tbl_size, tbl_col_num, all_row_count ) t1

select date_format(str_to_date(dt, '%Y%m%d'),'%Y-%m-%d') as `date`, round(sum(num),2) as dataNum from ( select dt, all_row_count as num from view_met_detail_outline group by dt, tbl_name, all_row_count ) t group by dt order by dt asc limit #{days}

select date_format(str_to_date(dt, '%Y%m%d'),'%Y-%m-%d') as `date`, round(sum(num)/1024,2) as dataNum from ( select dt, tbl_size as num from view_met_detail_outline group by dt, tbl_name, tbl_size ) t group by dt order by dt asc limit #{days}

SELECT tbl_name as tblName, round(tbl_size/1024,2) as tblSize, tbl_comment as tblComment FROM view_met_detail_outline WHERE dt = ( SELECT max( dt ) FROM view_met_detail_outline ) GROUP BY tbl_name, tbl_comment, tbl_size ORDER BY CAST(tbl_size AS DECIMAL) DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT tbl_name as tblName, round(all_row_count) as tblCount, tbl_comment as tblComment FROM view_met_detail_outline WHERE dt = ( SELECT max( dt ) FROM view_met_detail_outline ) GROUP BY tbl_name, tbl_comment, all_row_count ORDER BY CAST(all_row_count AS DECIMAL) DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT tbl_name as tblName, tbl_create_time as createTime, tbl_comment as tblComment FROM view_met_detail_outline WHERE dt = ( SELECT max( dt ) FROM view_met_detail_outline ) GROUP BY tbl_name, tbl_comment, tbl_col_num, tbl_create_time ORDER BY tbl_create_time DESC LIMIT 10

select a.tblName as tblName, a.tblComment as tblComment, (a.tblCount-b.tblCount) as tblCount from (SELECT tbl_name as tblName, round(all_row_count) as tblCount, tbl_comment as tblComment FROM view_met_detail_outline WHERE dt = DATE_FORMAT(curdate(),'%Y%m%d') GROUP BY tbl_name, tbl_comment, all_row_count )a LEFT JOIN (SELECT tbl_name as tblName, round(all_row_count) as tblCount, tbl_comment as tblComment FROM view_met_detail_outline WHERE dt = DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day),'%Y%m%d') GROUP BY tbl_name, tbl_comment, all_row_count )b on a.tblName=b.tblName order by a.tblCount-b.tblCount desc limit 10
SELECT col_name as colName, col_type as colType, col_comment as colComment FROM view_met_detail_outline WHERE dt = ( SELECT max( dt ) FROM view_met_detail_outline ) AND tbl_name= #{tblName}
